item.title: UBER
item.description: score:68 Chances: Uber is filing a legal appeal against the restrictions placed upon VTCs by the Paris mayor’s office, indicating a willingness to fight for market access. The company’s Freight segment is leveraging proprietary technology and experience to connect carriers with shippers on Uberâ€™s platform, potentially driving growth in the logistics sector.
